Name: position
Description: 0 means open, 100 means closed

Name: name
Description: a unique name for the passcode. duplicates under the same device are not allowed.

Name: type
Description: type of the passcode.
OptionsDescription: a permanent passcode.|a temporary passcode.|a one-time passcode.|an emergency passcode.

Name: password
Description: a 6 to 12-digit passcode in plain text

Name: startTime
Description: set the time the passcode becomes valid from, mandatory for one-time passcode and temporary passcode. a 10-digit timestamp.

Name: endTime
Description: set the time the passcode becomes expired, mandatory for one-time passcode and temporary passcode. a 10-digit timestamp.

Name: passcode_id
Description: the id of the passcode

Name: position
Description: 0 means closed, 100 means open, it MUST be set to a multiple of 2

Name: temperature
Description: the unit of temperature is in celsius

Name: mode
Description: modes include 1 (auto), 2 (cool), 3 (dry), 4 (fan), 5 (heat)

Name: fanspeed
Description: fan speed includes 1 (auto), 2 (low), 3 (medium), 4 (high)

Name: powerState
Description: power state includes on and off
